players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of a more suspicious target like me or Alice?"
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the real detective, why did you claim your result immediately? That's a risky move for night 1. I'm suspicious of this."

Diana: "Charlie, I investigated Bob because he seemed the most suspicious to me. As detective, I must act on my instincts to protect the town. My immediate reveal was necessary to prevent Bob from manipulating us."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
